citation.article-title: Description of Rummeliibacillus stabekisii gen. nov., sp. nov. and reclassification of Bacillus pycnus Nakamura et al. 2002 as Rummeliibacillus pycnus comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Rummeliibacillus pycnus (Nakamura et al. 2002) comb. nov.
Rummeliibacillus pycnus (pycâ€²nus. N.L. masc. adj. pycnus from Gr. adj. puknos thick, referring to the thick cells).
Basonym: Bacillus pycnus Nakamura et al. 2002.
In addition to the characteristics of B. pycnus summarized by Nakamura et al. (2002), the species exhibits the traits listed in the genus description above.
The type strain is NRRL NRS-1691T (=JCM 11075T).
